title: Design user interface mockups
description: Create high-fidelity mockups for the new dashboard interface including mobile responsive design

title: Implement authentication system
description: Set up JWT-based authentication with login, logout, and session management

title: Write unit tests for user service
description: Create comprehensive unit tests covering all user service methods and edge cases

title: Optimize database queries
description: Review and optimize slow database queries, add proper indexing for better performance

title: Create API documentation
description: Document all REST API endpoints with examples, request/response schemas, and authentication requirements

title: Setup deployment pipeline
description: Configure CI/CD pipeline with automated testing, building, and deployment to staging and production

title: Conduct user research interviews
description: Schedule and conduct 10 user interviews to gather feedback on current features and pain points

title: Fix responsive layout issues
description: Address mobile layout problems on tablet and small desktop screens, ensure consistent spacing

title: Implement data export feature
description: Allow users to export their data in CSV and JSON formats with filtering options

title: Security audit and penetration testing
description: Conduct comprehensive security review and penetration testing to identify vulnerabilities

title: Update dependencies and packages
description: Review and update all project dependencies to latest stable versions, check for security vulnerabilities

title: Design email notification templates
description: Create responsive email templates for user notifications, password resets, and welcome messages

title: Implement real-time notifications
description: Add WebSocket support for real-time notifications and live updates across the application

title: Performance monitoring setup
description: Integrate application performance monitoring tools and set up alerts for critical metrics

title: Refactor legacy code modules
description: Clean up and refactor old code modules to improve maintainability and follow current coding standards
